::Grounded::
Grounded listened to all that was happening.  He heard Arrow and with a 
touch of some buttons on his wrist comp the shields opened.
"Arrow, you must listen before taking act for I can tell from the energy 
in your spark what you may intend to do.  Burning Hammer is in...what 
you call a personality conflict, of what he is, and what he wants to be. 
  He proves to be no harm right now, so please leave him to be. But i 
feel the vibrations of something moving through the ground, which is my 
territory. Nightlight please help Burning Hammer and the rest.  Also i 
have heard something from that Deemos that is quite upsetting. He wishes 
to kill Trinity. Keep her out of trouble. I will leave now." Grounded 
replied and using only vibrations to tell where things were ran and dove 
outside digging into the ground in a perfevt path to intercept Stranato. 
Grounded had finally remembered all of his past, but he would worry 
about that later.

>  >

>  >
>  > Burning hammer: Shouldn't you open the shields?
>  >

> serial
>  > killer turned bounty hunter. Burning Hammer took his hand.
>  >

> him. if
>  > that tells how great I am.
>  >
>  > Zeni: You can still be great.
>  >
>  > Arrow: Open the damn door!
>  >
>  > Arrow never let up, never stopped yelling until he got what he
> wanted...
